author: ABC News
title: Video Severe flooding sweeps across Northeast
text:
Severe flooding sweeps across Northeast
ABC News meteorologist Melissa Griffing has the details on heavy rainfall that is causing flooding across the Northeast and where the storm is heading next.
December 28, 2023
